name: Minna ga Shuyaku no NHK Kouhaku Quiz Gassen
overview: Minna ga Shuyaku no NHK Kouhaku Quiz Kassen is a Wii video game released in 2009 by Nintendo. It is a quiz game that has Miis as the playable characters. The game, based off of the Japanese television show, includes a four player mode and a six player mode.
